@shailesh417
When YOU--through much dilligence and patience--become the one encoding ~100MB episodes that everybody else encodes at ~175MB, and then uploads and seeds them without cost or obligation to anybody that wants to snag them, then YOU TOO can be, and moreover, will have earned the RIGHT TO BE, an "arrogant bastard".  Until that time, how about "an attitude of gratitude"?
